events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred last night resulting in front bumper damage.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to the involved vehicle damage.
An agent was assigned to the claim to facilitate communication and assist with the process.
The customer received official acknowledgment of the claim submission and next steps.
Requested photos of the damaged vehicle and a police report to proceed with the claim investigation.
The customer submitted all required documents including photos and police report promptly.
The investigation into the vehicle collision and damage assessment officially commenced today.
The investigation team finished all inspections and reviewed submitted evidence for claim validity.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer based on repair estimates and policy coverage.
The customer provided positive feedback on the prompt handling and clear communication received.
The claim was officially approved for the proposed settlement amount without any disputes.
Insurance payment was issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover the car repairs as agreed.
The claim file was closed after successful payment and customer confirmation of issue resolution.
All documents and correspondence related to the claim were archived for future reference and compliance.
